author: COMSOL
description: Ibuprofen is an important anti-inflammatory drug, synthesized by palladium catalysis. This example illustrates the kinetic analysis of the complex reaction mechanism in a perfectly stirred batch reactor.
label: ibuprofen_synthesis.mph
name: root
